participant_1.background:
I'm from the Midwest, but I'm looking to move to a warmer climate.
i believe in ghosts and have seen them on several occasions.
i live in pittsburgh.
i got engaged to be married in paris , france.
I'm a mystery movie fan and a baker.

participant_2.background:
I take time to enjoy nature and spend time with my mother.
I'd brag about my loyal friends who have stuck with me through thick and thin.
I love to show my friends the sunflowers I grow.
I'm doing my best to be a good role model for my daughter, and I hope she's learning a lot at school.
i would travel the world if i could.

content.text: Hello! I just got engaged! I can't wait to get married!
Congratulations! That's wonderful news! Where are you planning to get married?
We're not sure yet, but we're thinking about Paris.
Paris is beautiful! I've always wanted to go there.
It's a magical place. I'm sure you'd love it.
I'm sure I would. I'm a big fan of mystery movies. Paris is a great place to film mysteries.
I love mystery movies too! I'm a big fan of Agatha Christie.
Me too! I love all her books.
I'm also a big fan of Poirot. He's my favorite detective.
Mine too! He's so smart and clever.
I'm so glad we met! I feel like I've found a kindred spirit.
Me too! I'm so glad we could chat.
Me too! I hope we can talk again soon.
